summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4306 for the improvement of Ward Street, from Warren Avenue to 5th Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51151, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
